name: Fotel Anda Seat T-Pro 2 Size XL Fabric Blue
description:
Anda Seat T-Pro 2 XL – Ultimate Comfort and Durability for Gamers

The Anda Seat T-Pro 2 XL is a premium gaming chair designed for passionate gamers and professionals seeking long-lasting comfort and full ergonomic support. Combining a modern, stylish design with high-performance features, this chair is built to elevate your gaming or work sessions.

Sturdy Construction and Premium Materials

Crafted with AD Alpha linen fabric and a TitanSteelAD+ frame made from 100% steel (22 mm diameter, 2 mm thickness), the T-Pro 2 XL offers a solid foundation and is backed by a lifetime warranty. Its scratch- and stain-resistant upholstery makes it a reliable addition to any setup. Available in three elegant colors: black, blue, and gray.

Ergonomic Adjustability

The chair features 4D adjustable armrests with polyurethane padding for superior elbow support. It also includes an adjustable backrest, allowing you to find the perfect seating angle. The armrests can be moved left/right, forward/backward, up/down, and rotated to reduce wrist strain and provide ideal positioning.

Maximum Comfort with Memory Foam

Equipped with high-density Memory Foam (65 kg/m³) and built using AD Mold technology, the T-Pro 2 XL provides long-lasting support that conforms to your body while retaining its shape over time. The AD+ Recline system and multi-tilt function (30° rocking range) let you relax between intense moments of gameplay or deep work.

Stable Movement and Clean Design

King Size PU-coated wheels ensure smooth and quiet movement across various floor surfaces. Combined with its bold design and ergonomic features, the Anda Seat T-Pro 2 XL offers not only professional-grade performance but also eye-catching aesthetics for your gaming station or office.
